fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Competition, Energy, Environment, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Biofuels and indirect land use change, Renewable Energy Sources Directive, 2030 climate change package, EU ETS, waste framework directive, possible application of EU-wide controls to compost and digestate from anaerobic digestion, circular economy, Energy Union
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations

goals__remit: The REA represents renewable energy producers and promotes the use of all forms of renewable energy in the UK. The REA covers the full spectrum of renewable energy technologies across power, heat, transport, renewable gas, organics recycling, electric vehicle, and energy storage.
